ARABIC: وَهُوَ ٱلْقَاهِرُ فَوْقَ عِبَادِهِۦ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He is the Absolute Master over His slaves. He is the All-Wise, the All-Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is He who prevails over His creatures, and He is all-wise and aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He has the supreme hold over His servants. He is All-Wise, All-Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He is Wise, Well Aware and Dominant over all His creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He is the Omnipotent over His bondmen; and He is the Wise, the Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And He is the Irresistible, above His servants, and He is the All-Wise, Well-Acquainted with all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He is the Supreme, above His servants; and He is the Wise, the Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He is Omnipotent over His servants, and He is the All-wise, the All-aware. Say: 'What thing is greatest in testimony?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He is the Omnipotent over His slaves, and He is the Wise, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He reigns Supreme over His servants; and He is the All Wise, the All Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He is the Supreme above His creatures; and He is the Wise, the Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And He is the All-dominant over His servants, and He is the All-wise, the All-aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He is the irresistible, (watching) from above over His worshippers; and He is the Wise, acquainted with all things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And He is the Irresistible, above His slaves, and He is the All-Wise, Well-Acquainted with all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He is the Conqueror over His worshipers. He is the Wise, the Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He is the Supreme over His servants. He is the Wise, the Expert.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And He is the subjugator over His servants. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted [with all].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:18] He is the Vanquisher, the Omnipotent, for Whom nothing is impossible, Superior [is He], over His servants, and He is the Wise, in His creation, the Aware, of their innermost [thoughts] as well as their outward [actions].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He is the Omnipotent) the All-Conquering (over His slaves, and He is the Wise) in His command and decree, (the Knower) of His created beings and their works.
